positive_examples: This is an example of military robot.
The military robot demonstrated clear characteristics.
We observed military robot in this context.
A typical case of military robot would involve these features.
The concept of military robot applies here.
A robot designed for military applications including reconnaissance, bomb disposal, or combat operations.
negative_examples: This is an example of autonomous mobile robot, not military robot.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: AutonomousMobileRobot, or other types of Robot

definition: A robot designed for military applications including combat and reconnaissance.
